title: Zombie Brand can detect stealthed champions
body:
When Zombie Brand is running towards an enemy champion, he will flail his arms. This also applies to stealthed champions and champions hiding in bushes. So, when running towards an enemy champion hiding in a bush, he will flail his arms and you'll be able to tell they're hiding in there long before you reach them. I main Brand and this has helped me almost every game, but it just isn't fair. Just thought I'd say something.

Flame on! {{champion:63}}

DO you have a video of this happening by any chance or a way to reliably demonstrate it? Brand's scripts are set up so his 'hunt' animations only play when there's a visible champion in front of him with 1500 units. Testing that in game I haven't seen the hunt run trigger towards a stealthed Teemo or other, non visible champions in brush/FOW.

The definition of 'front' is really wide (basically everything's either in front of you or behind you), so my suspicion is the run's actually triggering because you're moving towards (even if only very slightly) the enemy champion you're laning against. Certainly possible something's bugging out occasionally though, so as above a video or detailed repro steps would be really useful if something is going wrong.
